markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pistol of Wonder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1187)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Chaotic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=25" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 167</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Flintlock Pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=192)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flintlock pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=192)_ bears strange, jagged markings of erratic design and has an oddly squishy grip. It can be activated to produce a variety of unusual effects.

<document level="2" id="action-987" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Pistol of Wonder
